Message:
It all started with a simple
question from Chiffon.

I happened to spot her
and Flack while passing
through the courtyard.

Flack sure did her darndest
to try and explain,
but it looked like her points
weren’t really getting across.

Hmm~ It is kinda hard to put
that sense of wonder into words.
It’s definitely gotta be
experienced firsthand...

But, to think there are
kids out there who don’t know
anything about the circus.
In that case...

“We just gotta bring
the circus to them!”

Life’s way too short to
not know how fun it is!
So...

“C’mon, Flack!
This marks the beginning of
the Fran Circus Troupe!”
